title: Early Football Achievements
description: Began competitive play at district level and quickly became known for technical skill and game awareness. Early career highlights that showed passion for the sport and leadership on the field.

title: State Team Selection
result: Selected for Tamil Nadu State Team
description: Selected to represent Tamil Nadu in interstate championships, demonstrating consistent performance and tactical understanding.

title: University Captain
description: Led the university team, improving squad cohesion and match strategy while mentoring younger players.

title: Transition to Coaching
description: Began coaching career as a PT Teacher, focusing on fundamentals, discipline, and youth development. Built early coaching frameworks that emphasize character and teamwork.

title: Major Press Recognition
description: Recognized for innovative coaching and impactful community programs that expanded access to girls' football.

title: Founded Talent FC
description: Founded Talent FC to provide structured, high-quality training programs for young athletes, emphasizing technical skill, fitness, and character.

title: Youth Tournament Success
description: Led Talent FC youth squads to championship wins in regional competitions, showcasing effective coaching and player development.

title: Elite Coaching Recognition
description: Awarded advanced coaching certification for excellence in youth coaching practices and player development.

title: Ongoing Excellence
description: Talent FC expanded programs across more age groups and increased community outreachâ€”continuing to prepare players for district and state competitions.
